## Weather station project 

```{r getdata}
source = here("data","sheffielddata.txt")

#df <- read.csv(source,sep='\t',skip = 7)

df <- readLines(source)

df <- (gsub("Provisional","",df))

df <- (gsub("\\*","",df))

df <- (gsub("\\#","",df))

writeLines(df, here("data","modified.txt"))

df <- read.table(here("data", "modified.txt"),skip = 7, fill = TRUE)

```
